headline: Hg Capital nears deal to take OneStream private, Bloomberg News reports
summary: Buyout firm Hg Capital is in advanced talks to ​acquire financial software maker OneStream, ‌Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with ‌the matter. Reuters could not immediately verify the report. HG and OneStream did not immediately respond to Reuters' request for ⁠a comment.
